FuncDef:
The clock date-format command sets the date format on a device.
The undo clock date-format command restores the default date format on a device. The clock date-format command sets the date format on a device. The undo clock date-format command restores the default date format on a device. By default, the date format of a device is YYYY-MM-DD.

ParaDef.Info:
Indicates that the date format is YYYY-MM-DD, standing for year-month-day.
-

Indicates that the date format is MM-DD-YYYY, standing for month-day-year.
-
